name: Gun Law
overview: You’re a bounty hunter entering a deceptively sleepy town in the Badlands. For behind all of those windows and saloon doors there lurks the meanest bunch of trigger happy outlaws. There’s a handsome price on their heads, and they’re out to stop you collecting it But be careful as you try to outgun them - there are innocent townsfolk around, too. React fast or die young. Only your wits and guts will save you. Full colour graphics and sound effects give a realism that'll have you trembling in your boots.
